channel.title: Openresty on if1sh
channel.description: Recent content in Openresty on if1sh

item.title: jxwaf in openresty
item.description: 0x00 安装 $ cd /tmp $ git clone https://github.com/jx-sec/jxwaf.git $ cd jxwaf $ sh install_waf.sh $ 运行后显示如下信息即安装成功: nginx: the configuration file /opt/jxwaf/nginx/conf/nginx.conf syntax is ok nginx: configuration file /opt/jxwaf/nginx/conf/nginx.conf test is successful 远程规则: 访问 http://www.jxwaf.com 并注册账号，在 WAF规则管理-
